p: All the compounds were first tested for their potential toxicity on cell monolayer at different concentrations: furanodienone ( 1), curzerene ( 3) and β-elemene ( 4) at a range of 30–500 µg/mL; furanoeudesma-1,3-diene ( 2) at 2.5–30 µg/mL (due to the availability of a low amount of the standard compound). We found that compounds 1 and 3 showed toxicity at higher doses (starting from 100 µg/mL), while compound 4 was highly toxic at all the concentrations used. For this reason, the latter compound was excluded for the following experiments.
